text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So, our Fleetfoot Festival training<n>camp has officially started,
but...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew... Damn it. Thisisn't enough.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian! There you are.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Rudolf... What do you want? If it's<n>about archery training,
we still have<n>some time until it starts.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Well, if you can get ready with<n>lightning speed, then
yes, but...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Then that's what I'll do. Leave me<n>alone.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I can't believe that in between the<n>blood-boiling battles of
the Kikuka Sho,<n>the autumn Tenno Sho, the Japan<n>Cup,
and the Arima Kinen, I'm wasting<n>away out here in the
sticks.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: How am I supposed to sharpen my<n>fangs like this?!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Brian...

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text: Good work, everyone! Let's call it a<n>day here.

text_block_list.name: The Three
text_block_list.text: Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Curren, your moves have improved a<n>lot. Yukino, try and
relax your<n>shoulders a bit.

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Especially when it's your turn to take<n>center stage. That
part is the highlight<n>of the performance, so enjoy it,<n>okay?

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
O-okay! I'll practice 'til I'm jump'n<n>and jiv'n the whole
time!

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text: And City... Hmm... Your dancing is<n>beautiful, but...

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: But?

text_block_list.name: Dance Teacher
text_block_list.text: Hmm... No, never mind. You're doing<n>great just as you are!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Really? Well, as long as it's pretty,<n>that's all that matters.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes... Okay. So you received the<n>night-time leave documents.
Thank<n>you for the swift response, Air<n>Groove. Bye now.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: President! Oh... Sorry!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Not to worry, I've just finished on the<n>phone. Can I help
you with<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Well... I'm not sure if it's anything<n>worth bringing up yet,
but...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see. So the team isn't meshing so<n>well on your side either.
Thank you for<n>notifying me, Curren.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I've actually been thinking of some<n>measures for that very
issue, and the<n>preparations have just been put in<n>place.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Wow, really?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I will coax Brian into coming with<n>us on my end, so I'd
like to task you<n>with bringing Gold City and Yukino<n>Bijin
along on yours.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Wow, they even have fireworks! I'd<n>heard this autumn
festival was big,<n>and it's true!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
The person from the inn said this was<n>a pretty lively festival
for the area.<n>Ahh, the food stalls smell so good.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
B-but... should we really be enjoy'n<n>a festival right now?
We didn't come<n>here to dilly-dally...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
We're starting with the basics,<n>Yukino Bijin. Our task is to
make sure<n>people enjoy the festival, so it is vital<n>that we
see one with our own eyes.<n>Now...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Brian, which stall would you like to try<n>first? I like local items
that have a<n>regional flavor. Perhaps I'll buy some<n>for the
student council as thanks for<n>filling in during my absence.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
You did enough work to tide them<n>over for your absence
and more,<n>though. Whatever. I'm hungry. Let's<n>just find
something to eat.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
The lanterns on that shop are so cute<n>and colorful! The
lighting is nice and<n>soft, and if I stand right about here<n>and
look over my shoulder... Mm-hm!<n>The perfect shot! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Haha, true. I'll take it for you later,<n>Curren. What about you,
Yukino?<n>Don't be shy if there's anywhere<n>you wanna
check out too.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text:
Umm, in that case, the yo-yo fishing?<n>Ah, but that's too
childish, isn't it?<n>Haha!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Why not? Sounds good to me. The<n>designs are usually
pretty cute too.<n>Besides... that's such a Yukino thing<n>to do!
I'll snap a pic of that too.

text_block_list.name: Yukino Bijin
text_block_list.text: Gee, thank you!

text_block_list.name: Local Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
E-excuse me! You're Curren, right?<n>Sorry to approach you
out of the blue!<n>It's just I... I follow you on<n>Umastagram!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Oh, thank you! I'm glad you came to<n>speak to me! ♪

text_block_list.name: Local Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You're training for the ceremonial<n>dance at the Fleetfoot
Festival right<n>now, aren't you? Ooh, I just can't<n>wait! I'll
definitely come and see it!

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Thanks, I'll see you there! Oh, and<n>please use the tags
"#Curren" and<n>"#CeremonialDance" when you post<n>about
it, okay? ♪ I'll be searching for<n>people's comments! ☆

text_block_list.name: Local Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay! We're gonna make sure<n>you're trending! Thank
you for talking<n>to me in your private time! I'll leave<n>you to
it now!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Your post about the ceremonial dance<n>went pretty viral, huh.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
This whole dance thing is a bit<n>different from my usual vibe,
so I think<n>everyone's just surprised. I'm glad<n>the
reactions have been mostly<n>positive on the whole though! ♪

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
And with that, I think I've done a<n>good job of playing my
role.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: What do you mean, your role?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
Like, my part? I think I was chosen as<n>a mascot this time
around. My image<n>doesn't exactly shout "history" or<n>
"tradition" or anything, y'know?

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text:
So I thought I'd do what I do best and<n>make sure this
festival goes viral. I'm<n>serious about the dance, though. I<n>
wanna surprise people with that.

text_block_list.name: Curren Chan
text_block_list.text: Or at least, that's what I thought<n>would be cutest! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Curren... Oh. Wow, you're amazing.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Seriously... amazing.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, what a wonderful aroma! The<n>scent of sizzling sauce
is truly<n>exceptional. Brian, shall we go to the<n>yakisoba
stand next? I bet that's the<n>"sauce" of that scent...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
I don't want any. Not enough meat.<n>That won't fire up my
body at all.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm, if you say sauce. Let's go down<n>that path over there
then! They had<n>skewered meat and vegetables on<n>the
grill. I'm sure we'll find something<n>to your taste.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
Tch... What is this? Trying to act like<n>my older sister? As if
you're doing<n>me a favor?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Not at all. I don't intend to challenge<n>Biwa Hayahide in that
regard.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I just... want you to enjoy yourself.<n>However you see fit.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: ...What?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Just have fun, Brian. That goes for<n>this festival, the
Fleetfoot Festival, and<n>the archery show with me.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: That's all I wish for you.
